es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica6.net

Interface SocketEndpoint

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameClient, ObjectEndpoint

    public interface SocketEndpoint
    A very simple interface for listening and responding to data on sockets.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectionEstablished()
      Will be called when communication is first established.
      void dataReceived(java.lang.Object data)
      Will be called when data is received.
      void sendData(java.lang.Object data)
      Call this to send data to the other side.
      void start(java.net.Socket socket, int timeout)
      Call this to start listening on the socket.
      void stop()
      Call this to stop communication.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start(java.net.Socket socket,
         int timeout)
        Call this to start listening on the socket. Any incoming data will result in a call to dataReceived.
        Parameters:
        socket - the socket on which to start listening.
        timeout - the timeout for the socket.

      • connectionEstablished

        void connectionEstablished()
        Will be called when communication is first established.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Call this to stop communication.

      • dataReceived

        void dataReceived(java.lang.Object data)
        Will be called when data is received.
        Parameters:
        data - the object received.

      • sendData

        void sendData(java.lang.Object data)
        Call this to send data to the other side.
        Parameters:
        data - the object sent.
